Disease_Carrier.display_help: You have been infected with the Vahzilok Wasting Disease. This disease, introduced by the Vahzilok, is slowly wasting you away. Find a cure, quick! Your Max Hit Points, Endurance, Regeneration, and Recovery have been reduced.
Disease_Carrier.display_target_help: The Diseased Vahzilok is infecting you, reducing your recovery and regeneration rates.
Disease_Carrier.display_victim_hit: The Diseased Vahzilok is infecting you, reducing your recovery and regeneration rates.

Scalpel.display_help: The Doctor has Disoriented you with his Scalpel.
Scalpel.display_target_help: The Doctor has Disoriented you with his Scalpel.

Assault_Rifle.display_help: Dr. Vahzilok has reduces your defense with his grafted assault weapon.

Dart_Gun.display_help: The dart has slowed your attack rate and movement speed.

Multishot_Dart_Gun.display_help: The dart has slowed your attack rate and movement speed.

Venomous_Spray.display_help: You are taking Toxic damage over time and are unable to act due to the noxious fumes.

Resurrect_Zombie.display_help: Facemaker can resurrect a fallen Cadaver or Abomination.

Resistance.display_help: Cadavers are resistant to Sleep, Fear and Immobilization. They are also resistant to smashing and lethal damage but they are slow. They also are fairly dumb, and have may wander around mindlessly if there are no Reapers around to tell them what to do.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Smash, Lethal, Immobilization
Resistance.display_target_help: Cadavers are resistant to Sleep, Fear and Immobilization. They are also resistant to smashing and lethal damage but they are slow. They also are fairly dumb, and have may wander around mindlessly if there are no Reapers around to tell them what to do.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Smash, Lethal, Immobilization

Dark_Embrace.display_help: The Eidolon taps into the energy of the netherworld to protect him from damage. Dark Embrace shrouds the Eidolon in darkness and grants the Eidolon resistance to Lethal, Smashing, and Negative Energy Damage. Cannot be used at the same time as Murky Cloud or Obsidian Shield.
